# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by user
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.swp
*.tmp
*.log

# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/
[Ll]og/
[Bb]uild/

# Rider IDE
.idea/

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# Backup & cache
*.bak
*.cache
*.config
*.dbmdl

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# Others
*.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Environment files
.env
appsettings.Development.json

# Test coverage / reports
TestResults/
coverage/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
